Set of tools for calculating energy efficiency in industrial equipment

OptimalPumpEfficiency.cpp
1 
11 #include <cmath>
12 #include "calculator/pump/OptimalPumpEfficiency.h"
13 #include "calculator/pump/OptimalPrePumpEff.h"
14 #include "calculator/pump/OptimalSpecificSpeed.h"
15 #include "calculator/pump/OptimalSpecificSpeedCorrection.h"
16 #include "calculator/pump/OptimalDeviationFactor.h"
17 
18 double OptimalPumpEfficiency::calculate() {
19 
20  OptimalPrePumpEff optimalPrePumpEff(style, flowRate);
21  prePumpEfficiency = optimalPrePumpEff.calculate();
22  /*
23  * You may have individual functions for each also.
24  */
25  /*
26  * Viscosity Correction Factor
27  */
28  double parameterB = 26.6 * (std::pow(kinematicViscosity, 0.5) * std::pow(head, 0.0625))
29  / (std::pow(flowRate, 0.375) * std::pow(rpm, 0.25));
30  double viscosityCorrectionFactor = std::fmin(1, (std::pow(parameterB, -(0.0547 * std::pow(parameterB, 0.69)))));
31  /*
32  * Speed Correction
33  */
34  OptimalSpecificSpeed optimalSpecificSpeed(rpm,flowRate, head, stageCount);
35  double specificSpeed = optimalSpecificSpeed.calculate();
36  OptimalSpecificSpeedCorrection optimalSpecificSpeedCorrection(style, specificSpeed);
37  double speedCorrection = optimalSpecificSpeedCorrection.calculate();
38  /*
39  * positiveDeviationFactor
40  */
41  OptimalDeviationFactor optimalDeviationFactor(flowRate);
42  double positiveDeviationFactor = optimalDeviationFactor.calculate();
43  /*
44  * Optimal Efficiency
45  */
46  prePumpEfficiency = prePumpEfficiency / 100;
47  optimalEfficiency = (prePumpEfficiency * viscosityCorrectionFactor - speedCorrection) * positiveDeviationFactor;
48  return optimalEfficiency;
49 }
